name: Witch Apprentice [Early-Alpha]
description:
Chose your fighter to battle in this targetting based brawl game!

Witch Apprentice's development has started in November of 2019 and we have been working on it's concept, art and mecanics since then, we are very happy to finally share our project with all of you!

This is the beginning of a long journey together and we cannot wait for you to discover what vision we have for the future!

Because this game is currently in development, we would love to have your feedback and bug reports in this form! You can also join our Discord to engage directly with us!

Created and developed by Philippe Hartmann and Julien Plateau.

DISCLAIMER: Witch Apprentice is currently in pre-production. Gameplay, audio and visual material may not represent the final product. Check the development roadmapfor more information.

FOR HOME USE ONLY.
